led-wall-examples.description: Example preset configurations for common LED wall scenarios

presets.name: wide-led-wall-3840x1080
presets.description: Ultra-wide LED wall - two 1920x1080 panels side-by-side
presets.use_case: Two separate content streams on ultra-wide wall

presets.name: vertical-stack-1920x2160
presets.description: Vertical LED stack - two 1920x1080 panels stacked
presets.use_case: Vertically stacked displays with independent content

presets.name: stage-backdrop-plus-monitor
presets.description: Main stage backdrop with small confidence monitor
presets.use_case: Zone 1: stage content, Zone 2: presenter notes/timer

presets.name: quad-wall-top-half
presets.description: Quad LED wall - top two panels (2x2 grid)
presets.use_case: Two zones in quad configuration (expand with more zones in future)

presets.name: main-plus-sidebar
presets.description: Main content area with sidebar for live feed
presets.use_case: Zone 1: main presentation, Zone 2: live RTSP camera feed

presets.name: event-dual-camera
presets.description: Two camera feeds for live event monitoring
presets.use_case: Zone 1: RTSP camera 1, Zone 2: RTSP camera 2

presets.name: custom-led-panels-5760x1080
presets.description: Three 1920x1080 LED panels in a row
presets.use_case: Ultra-wide triple panel with split content (left 1.5 panels, right 1.5 panels)

presets.name: portrait-display-1080x1920
presets.use_case: Vertical display split top/bottom for signage

usage_notes.importing_presets: Use the web interface or API to create these presets manually
usage_notes.display_resolution: Always set display resolution first via Settings or API
usage_notes.testing: Test with 'stop-all' between configurations to verify positioning
usage_notes.rtsp_sources: Replace file sources with rtsp://... URLs for live camera feeds
usage_notes.performance: Pi 5 recommended for 4K+ resolutions or dual 1080p streams

workflow_example.step1: Set display resolution via API or web interface
workflow_example.step2: Create and save preset with desired zone geometries
workflow_example.step4: Start playback in each zone with appropriate sources
workflow_example.step5: Save additional presets for different show configurations
